groups.name: Technology Hardware, Storage & Peripherals
groups.thesis: AI infrastructure buildout driving record demand for high-capacity storage. NAND pricing stabilizing; HDD nearline demand surging from hyperscaler data centers.
groups.thesis_breaker: AI capex slowdown, hyperscaler order deferrals, or NAND oversupply from Chinese fabs (YMTC).

breaker_alerts.description: S&P 500 drops >10% from YTD high (proxy for macro risk-off / capex freeze)
Group avg RSI falls below 40 — momentum breakdown
>50% of stocks fall below 50-day MA — trend reversal
Group avg YTD return turns negative — leadership lost

groups.name: Specialty Chemicals — TiO2
groups.thesis: Cyclical mean-reversion. TiO2 volumes recovering, supply being cut (plant closures). Destocking cycle ending across specialty chemicals.
groups.thesis_breaker: China TiO2 dumping, construction/auto demand double-dip, or energy cost spikes.

breaker_alerts.message: Energy (XLE) up 19.1% YTD — cost pressure on chemical margins
breaker_alerts.description: Energy (XLE) surges >15% YTD — energy cost pressure on margins
Group avg YTD return turns negative

groups.name: Oil & Gas Drilling
groups.thesis: Structural upcycle: no new deepwater rigs since 2014, aging fleet, accelerating project sanctioning. Day rates $400K/day.
groups.thesis_breaker: Oil below $60, OPEC+ supply surge, or rapid transition to onshore/unconventional.

breaker_alerts.description: Crude oil (USO) drops >25% from recent high — approaching $60 breakeven

groups.name: Gold Mining
groups.thesis: Record gold prices with massive operating leverage. Central bank buying, geopolitical risk, de-dollarization. Broadest group — 13+ stocks beating S&P.
groups.thesis_breaker: Sharp rise in real interest rates, USD strength, gold reversal below $2,400, or mining cost inflation.

breaker_alerts.message: Gold (GLD) down -9.2% from recent high — commodity thesis weakening
breaker_alerts.description: Gold (GLD) drops >8% from recent high — commodity thesis weakening
DXY (UUP) rises >5% YTD — USD strength crushing gold
<50% of stocks beating S&P 500 (was 90%+) — breadth deteriorating

groups.name: Oil & Gas Exploration & Production
groups.thesis: Nat gas E&P benefiting from LNG export additions 2026-27. Oil E&P supported by OPEC+ discipline. Selective, not broad.
groups.thesis_breaker: OPEC+ production increases, warm winters killing nat gas, or global recession.

breaker_alerts.description: Crude oil drops >25% from recent high
Natural gas (UNG) drops >30% from recent high

groups.name: Oil & Gas Refining & Marketing
groups.thesis: Crack spreads elevated as refining capacity additions lag closures. Export demand from Latin America supporting Gulf Coast economics.
groups.thesis_breaker: Crack spread compression from new ME/Asia capacity, demand destruction.

breaker_alerts.description: Group avg YTD return turns negative

groups.name: Aerospace & Defense
groups.thesis: European rearmament (NATO 3%+ GDP), Ukraine, Pacific tensions creating multi-year defense supercycle.
groups.thesis_breaker: Peace deals, budget sequestration, CR-driven spending delays, or program cancellations.

breaker_alerts.description: Group avg YTD return turns negative

groups.name: Uranium Mining & Nuclear Fuel
groups.thesis: Nuclear renaissance driven by AI data center power demand. Uranium supply structurally deficient. BofA targets $135/lb vs $81-88 current.
groups.thesis_breaker: Uranium price pullback, SMR delays, or return of Russian/Kazakh supply.

breaker_alerts.description: Group avg YTD return turns negative

groups.name: Semiconductors — Memory & HBM
groups.thesis: HBM is the critical bottleneck for AI training/inference. Supply fully booked through 2026; prices rising ~20%. TAM from $35B to $100B by 2028.
groups.thesis_breaker: AI training efficiency gains reducing memory per GPU, Chinese HBM alternatives, or customer inventory digestion.

breaker_alerts.description: Group avg YTD return turns negative
